text:
What's up, everyone? I'm Andrea, your
RealLife English fluency coach and we

have another really fun lesson for you.
We are learning English today with the
classic teen comedy Mean Girls.
This high school comedy tells the story of Cady

who has recently moved back to the
United States after living in Africa for

12 years with her family and she is
experiencing high school for the first
time in her life.

This movie is great for
learning American slang pronunciation
and so much more.

In case you're new here
we want to let you know that every week

we make lessons just like this one to
help you learn English without getting

lost, without missing the jokes and
without subtitles.

Just like Waseem who says that our
channel has helped him learn so much
pronunciation and vocabulary.
So don't forget to hit that subscribe button and

the bell down below so that you don't
miss a single lesson.
Now let's learn English with Mean Girls!

Would you like to
master how natives really speak?

Then I highly recommend our Fluent with Friends
course in this forty eight week course

you will learn with first two seasons of
Friends, receive PDF power lessons

every week, vocabulary
memorization software and be part of our

Fluency Circle global community so that
you are never alone in your learning and

the best part is you can try that right
now for free with our three-part Masterclass.

All you have to do is click up
here or in the description box below so
that you can learn more and sign up now!
Do you want to learn more American expressions?
Then why not check out our

lesson with Scarlett Johansson in Lucy,
the incredible science fiction action movie.

You can click up here or in the
description box below to watch it
straight after this lesson.
